title: I am so disappointed in all of you and the community.
body:
https://gyazo.com/8ca49eb92b016adb9a88026c641f370b

I thought we were trying to beat cancer, not empower it!

replies.body: oh no, its spreading.  how much of an option is kemo?
not sure which is worse anymore
Darkside's got cookies what did you expect?
they are both cancer,, there is no winning there is just losing a little less
